title: Fixed broken width determination on orientation change
message:
Fixed broken width determination on orientation change

Width determination is used for displaying the substitution information only when there is enough space (avoids horizontal scrolling). The determination will fail if the device is rotated because the activity's layout has not been fully created and therefore it will return wrong values.
The fix determines the device's screen width on app startup by using a dummy activity (MeasureActivity) with a custom view. This dummy activity will start the MainActivity immediately.

Furthermore, bump version.

message:

title: Added teacher mode
message:
Added teacher mode

Teachers can now see their own table, which has a different data structure. Therefore a separate SubstitutionTable class is needed. Teacher mode is detected by comparing the username string with "Lehrer".

title: Fixed hack to ensure activity creation
message:
Fixed hack to ensure activity creation

To ensure, that the activity has been created, call updateTable(..) only in onActivityCreated(..), not in onCreateView(..). The hack, calling fillTable(..) after a delay, has been removed as it is unnecessary now.

title: Fixed crash caused by scrolling the entry table when no adapter has been set
message:
Fixed crash caused by scrolling the entry table when no adapter has been set

Resulted in a NullPointerException. FIX: Hide entry table until the adapter has been set.

title: Fixed displaying of daily information
message:
Fixed displaying of daily information

The daily information table was hidden behind the entry table, it is now properly displayed.
Furthermore, daily information entries consisting of only one column were ignored.

title: Improved networking code
message:
Improved networking code

- Error handling: Every generic exception like NullPointerException will indicate an error, so that the reason for a failed login can be determined (either wrong password/username combination or any networking exception)
- Code consistency: CommunicationInterface can only be instantiated via .getInstance(); a successful login will trigger a logout
- Android 2.2 compatibility: Patched jsoup because of missing String.isEmpty() in Java std library
